Subject: Tag team 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He shot down one of the missiles, but the other one got to close. He
rocketed away, putting some distance between him and the missile. At the
right moment he spun around with the saw in his right hand, and
destroyed the missile. 

The Najah's bazooka blast hit him, sending him out of control for a few
seconds.

"What is this, a Tag Team?!"

He then shoots two missiles at Vehement, and four plasma charges at
Najah.
